messages.content:
<!-- MyBatis Setting -->
	<beans:bean id="dataSourceMyBatis" class="org.apache.commons.dbcp.BasicDataSource">
		<beans:property name="driverClassName" value="${database.driver}" />
		<beans:property name="url" value="${database.url}" />
		<beans:property name="username" value="${database.username}" />
		<beans:property name="password" value="${database.password}" />
	</beans:bean>


	<beans:bean id="sqlSessionFactory" class="org.mybatis.spring.SqlSessionFactoryBean">
		<beans:property name="dataSource" ref="dataSourceMyBatis" />
		<beans:property name="configLocation" value="classpath:mybatis-config.xml" />
<!--
		<beans:property name="mapperLocations" value="classpath:mybatis/**/*.xml" />
 -->

	</beans:bean>

	<beans:bean class="org.mybatis.spring.mapper.MapperScannerConfigurer">
		<beans:property name="basePackage" value="jp.co.nissaycap.mapper" />
		<beans:property name="sqlSessionFactoryBeanName" value="sqlSessionFactory" />
	</beans:bean>

	<beans:bean id="transactionManager"
		class="org.springframework.jdbc.datasource.DataSourceTransactionManager">
		<beans:property name="dataSource" ref="dataSourceMyBatis" />
	</beans:bean>

	<tx:annotation-driven transaction-manager="transactionManager" />
<!--
